### android_intake
android small assignment


# create a heartbeat interval for api that retrieves new update every 5 seconds 





## Requirement
   - app should use default cardview and must show new data from api to the cardview when new update arrives
   - app should compile without any error
   - app should log when requesting periodic update from api server every **5 second** (either log or ui loading bar)
   - app must present new data(which is a json array list) in `CardView`     (https://developer.android.com/reference/android/support/v7/widget/CardView.html)








## Things you need 

* Labtop with android studio and emulator installed (provided)

* the endpoint you need to call to get a latest update is `https://api-final.herokuapp.com/log/allusers/latest`

* you need to put `X-Auth-Token` of `eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..zppmrpQYwQvWrhGyTYwLQJ-z7sXG_zjBbmpPCGFemb0` for api request you are making
